value:
I used to pray to the goddess for
forgiveness. But more than anything,
I wished she'd take me away with her.

There was a horse named Dorte
who I was close to back at Garreg
Mach. I hope he's doing well...

When I was given this outfit, Hilda
was so happy for me it was as if
she'd gotten it herself.

I want to express my gratitude, but...
I-I'm sorry—I don't know what to say.

Growth as a practitioner of the
mystic arts has no positive impact
on one's ability to keep things tidy...

Many blessings be upon you. I've
come with a symbol of friendship
from $Nf.

I...I'm all right. I think I can move
forward now.
Goddess, I ask for your guidance...
Misfortune seems to follow me...

Are you concerned for me? Is that
the reason for this gift? I appreciate
your thoughtfulness, of course...

I'm Marianne von Edmund. I, um...
I'm sorry to be a waste of your, er...
Excuse me...

I've always...avoided others, ever
since I was little. I struggle to open up
to any but animals and the goddess.$k$pYou see, it has always been easier
to be alone than...to interact with
people, afraid all the time.$k$pBut I've changed now. I have people
who support even someone like me.
There are those who have faith in me.$k$pI no longer want to retreat from life.
I want to keep moving forward, side
by side with those I care for...$k$pO-of course, you are one of those
people, $Nu.$k$pI will press onward for those who
accept me...for those who care for
me as I care for them.
ふっ
やあっ
くうっ
いけない…
If you believe in me...
Lend me your strength...
I must have courage.
Forgive me!
I'm just not good enough...
*Exhale*
Is everything OK?
Keep your chin up.
I don't think I understand it, but I suppose they chose me for a reason...
I have to grow stronger than I am now. I need to make myself useful.
Does this outfit look OK? Sorry. I, um...I'm just not sure...
Please, goddess... Lend me the courage I need...
I'm not the most, um, confident person, but I... I want to do my best for you.
I see...
Over there?
I'll return soon.
